title: Add Mac Catalyst and move things into the gn files
body:
**Description of Change**

This PR is adding Mac Catalyst builds and also moves a few basic defines into the gn files to avoid the need for the values to be in the cake files.

> At this time, I can't test Mac Catalyst because of https://github.com/xamarin/xamarin-macios/issues/11061 but the iOS changes seem to not affect anything.

**Bugs Fixed**

None.

**API Changes**

None.

**Behavioral Changes**

None.

**PR Checklist**

- [x] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [x] Rebased on top of main at time of PR
- [x] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation
